articles.author: Jordan Middler
articles.title: ChatGPT was used to write Gollum game apology, it's claimed | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: Several former Daedalic employees have spoken for the first time about the issues surrounding the development of The Lord of the Rings Gollum.
articles.content:
A.I. program ChatGPT was used to write the apology for the bug-filled Lord of the Rings Gollum game, it’s been claimed.
In interviews with the German gaming outlet GameTwo (spotted by Knoebel), seve… [+2772 chars]
